scripts.cy:run: npm run set-testing-env staging1 && npx cypress run --headed --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.staging-headless: export REGION=staging1; npx cypress run --config-file staging.config.js --config --env region=$REGION --spec cypress/e2e/features/transactions/expense.feature --headed --browser chrome && npm run report
scripts.cypress:staging:headless: npx cypress run --spec 'file-path' --headed --browser chrome --config-file staging.config.js --config --env region=$REGION
scripts.staging: npm run set-testing-env && npm run cypress:open
scripts.beta: npm run set-beta-env && npm run cypress:open
scripts.prod: npm run set-prod-env && npm run cypress:open
scripts.funder: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/1_funder.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.agency: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/2_agency.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.limited: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/3_limited.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.umbrella: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/4_umbrella.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.client: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/client.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.contractor: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/entities_onboarding/contractor.feature --headless --browser electron --env TAGS=@E2E
scripts.entities: npm run funder && npm run agency && npm run limited && npm run umbrella && npm run client && npm run contractor
scripts.self-serve-beta: npm run set-beta-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/agencySelfService/permRequest/permanentPlacementRequest.feature --headed --browser electron
scripts.timesheet: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/transactions/timesheet.feature --headed --browser electron
scripts.expense: npm run set-testing-env && npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/transactions/expense.feature --headed --browser electron
